item.description:
"Located in the Back Bay, The Wine Cellar Restaurant offers an alternative 'to the same old dining experience'. The restaurant specializes in European cuisine with over thirty fondues ranging from cheese, oil, broth, courbouillon, and chocolate.  Step into a small but very cozy dining room with hand painted murals of historic New England buildings and landscape with wrought iron accents and hanging lanterns. The Wine Cellar Restaurant has become a destination for wine lovers and food enthusiast."

http://www.bostoncellar.com/events.htm

Please come dressed business casual and with cash! Thank you!

group.name: Breakfast, Brunch, Lunch, & Dinner Meetup Group

item.name: The Wine Cellar - Restaurant Week!
